meanings.sent1: The butterfly flickers from flower to flower.
meanings.sent2: The leaves flickers in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel flickers its tail in excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her smile flickers across her face like a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The firefly flickers in the dark night, mesmerizing all who watch.

meanings.definition: A brief burst of light or flame
meanings.sent1: The flickers of the campfire warmed our hearts.
meanings.sent2: The flickers of the candle danced on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The flickers of the fireworks lit up the sky with joy.
meanings.sent4: The flickers of the distant lighthouse guided the ships safely.
meanings.sent5: The flickers of the shooting star brought a moment of magic to the night sky.

meanings.sent1: She caught the flickers of his hand signaling her to come closer.
meanings.sent2: The flickers of the cat's tail showed its irritation.
meanings.sent3: The flickers of the baby's fingers grasping at the toy were adorable.
meanings.sent4: His flickers of impatience were evident in his tapping foot.
meanings.sent5: The flickers of the conductor's baton directed the orchestra with precision.
